Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board

Class PolylineTrace

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board.Item
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board.Trace
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board.PolylineTrace
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connectable, ObjectInfoPanel.Printable, SearchTreeObject, Drawable, ShapeTree.Storable, UndoableObjects.Storable, Serializable, Comparable<Object>
public class PolylineTrace extends Trace implements Serializable
Objects of class Trace, whose geometry is described by a Polyline
See Also:

    • combine

      public boolean combine()
      Checks if other traces can be combined with this trace. Returns true, if something has been combined. This trace will be the combined trace, so that only other traces may be deleted.

    • split

      public Collection<PolylineTrace> split(IntOctagon p_clip_shape)
      Looks up traces intersecting with this trace and splits them at the intersection points. In case of an overlaps, the traces are split at their first and their last common point. Returns the pieces resulting from splitting. Found cycles are removed. If nothing is split, the result will contain just this Trace. If p_clip_shape != null, the split may be resticted to p_clip_shape.
      Specified by:
      split in class Trace

    • split

      public Trace[] split(Point p_point)
      Splits this trace into two at p_point. Returns the 2 pieces of the splitted trace, or null if nothing was splitted because for example p_point is not located on a line segment of the p_polyline of this trace.
      Specified by:
      split in class Trace

    • normalize

      public boolean normalize(IntOctagon p_clip_shape) throws Exception
      Splits this trace and overlapping traces, and combines this trace. Returns true, if something was changed. If p_clip_shape != null, splitting is restricted to p_clip_shape.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • pull_tight

      public boolean pull_tight(PullTightAlgo p_pull_tight_algo)
      Tries to shorten this trace without creating clearance violations Returns true, if the trace was changed.
      Specified by:
      pull_tight in class Trace

      Tries to pull this trace tight without creating clearance violations Returns true, if the trace was changed.

      Tries to smoothen the end corners of this trace, which are at a fork with other traces.

    • check_connection_to_pin

      public boolean check_connection_to_pin(boolean p_at_start)
      checks, that the connection restrictions to the contact pins are satisfied. If p_at_start, the start of this trace is checked, else the end. Returns false, if a pin is at that end, where the connection is checked and the connection is not ok.
      Specified by:
      check_connection_to_pin in class Trace

    • correct_connection_to_pin

      public boolean correct_connection_to_pin(boolean p_at_start, AngleRestriction p_angle_restriction)
      Tries to correct a connection restriction of this trace. If p_at_start, the start of the trace polygon is corrected, else the end. Returns true, if this trace was changed.

    • swap_connection_to_pin

      public boolean swap_connection_to_pin(boolean p_at_start)
      Looks, if an other pin connection restriction fits better than the current connection restriction and changes this trace in this case. If p_at_start, the start of the trace polygon is changed, else the end. Returns true, if this trace was changed.
